basic_information.scholarship_name: Dr. Donna Cobb Scholarship in Exercise and Fitness Management
basic_information.scholarship_notes: Eligible for full disbursement if graduating in December

description: To provide scholarship assistance to students within the College of Education Professional Studies who are majoring in Kinesiology- Exercise Fitness Management. Eligibility Requirements Student who are majoring in Kinesiology - Exercise Fitness Management Minimum of 3.0 GPA Must provide 2 letters of professional recommendation Selection Process Recipients of the scholarship will be selected by a departmental committee Award Requirements Must be enrolled in the upcoming fall and spring semester to receive award Attendance at an awards banquet is required for all recipients Recipients must write a thank you letter to the donors of the scholarship

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: SIS_College is Education and Prof Studies
criteria.raw_text: SIS_College is Education and Prof Studies

criteria.description: SIS_Major is Kinesiology-Ex/Fitness Mngt   or SIS_Major_1_2 is Kinesiology-Ex/Fitness Mngt   or SIS_Major_2_2 is Kinesiology-Ex/Fitness Mngt
criteria.raw_text: SIS_Major is Kinesiology-Ex/Fitness Mngt   or SIS_Major_1_2 is Kinesiology-Ex/Fitness Mngt   or SIS_Major_2_2 is Kinesiology-Ex/Fitness Mngt
